title: Challenger? Any idea?
content:
Hi philes!

Does anyone know the font "Challenger" ??  
My font-app tells me that this PDF uses "Challenger" but I can't find it among the foundries that I know of... any help here?

It's particular the headlines I'm chasing.

TIA!

/H
